titleStmt.title: Mellificium musarum: the marrovv of the muses. Or, An epitome of divine poetrie Distilled into pious ejaculations, and solemne soliloquies. By Jeremiah Rich. Junii 19. 1650. Imprimatur, Joseph Caryl.
titleStmt.author: Rich, Jeremiah, d. 1660?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T.H. for John Stephenson, and are to be sold at his shop on Ludgate hill, at the sign of the Sun,

notesStmt.note: Title page printed in red and black.
The words "Pious .. Soliloquies." are joined by a left brace on title page.
A selection of poems by various authors, collected by Jeremiah Rich.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop on Ludgate hill, at the sign of the Sun
